item.fnc.four_leaf_clover_ring: Ring of the Four Leaf Clover
fnc:divine_armor_set_bonus:
(4) Set Bonus:
-50% Magic Damage
+50% Smite Duration
fnc:mischief_armor_set_bonus:
(4) Set Bonus:
+1 Wild Magic Luck
50% chance for a positive random SpellAdjustment
fnc.feedback.selected.spelladjustment.co: The condition of the selected Spell Adjustment was not fulfilled!
fnc.feedback.selected.wildmagic.conditio: The condition of the selected Wild Magic was not fulfilled!
fnc:shapes/paladin_smite.desc.damage: The damage increase caused by the Smite.
fnc:shapes/counter_attack.desc.duration: The maximum duration of the Counter Attack effect.
fnc:shapes/counter_attack.desc.magnitude: Number of times a counter attack can occur.
fnc.component.smite.no_player.error: The spell can only target players
fnc:components/booming_smite.desc.damage: The damage increase caused by the Smite.
fnc:components/booming_smite.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
fnc:components/booming_smite.desc.magnit: Determines the strength of the explosion.
fnc:components/booming_smite.desc.precis:
Determines whether the explosion causes damage to blocks. 
With maximum precision you will be spared from the explosion, but the explosion will only have half the power
fnc:components/burning_smite.desc.damage: The damage increase caused by the Smite.
fnc:components/burning_smite.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
fnc:components/burning_smite.desc.durati: The duration for which the smite-target will be on fire.
fnc:components/cause_wild_magic.desc.pre:
0: Neutral - Very Good Effects
1: All Effects
2:Very Bad - Neutral Effects
fnc:components/crippling_smite.desc.dama: The damage increase caused by the Smite.
fnc:components/crippling_smite.desc.dela: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
fnc:components/crippling_smite.desc.dura: The duration of the effects on the smite-target.
fnc:components/dispelling_smite.desc.dam: The damage increase caused by the Smite.
fnc:components/dispelling_smite.desc.del: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
fnc:components/dispelling_smite.desc.mag: Magic Drain Strength (longer and stronger effects can be removed)
fnc:components/hexing_smite.desc.damage: The damage increase caused by the Smite.
fnc:components/hexing_smite.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
fnc:components/random_tp.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
fnc:components/random_tp.desc.range: The maximum distance that can be teleported to. Each point raises the cap by 20 blocks.
fnc:components/silencing_smite.desc.dama: The damage increase caused by the Smite.
fnc:components/silencing_smite.desc.dela: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
A delay in seconds before applying this component.
fnc:components/wild_damage.desc.damage: The maximum damage dealt to affected targets.
fnc:components/wild_damage.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
fnc:components/wild_damage.desc.duration: The duration of the wild magic that will affect the target.
fnc:components/wild_damage.desc.magnitud: Strength of wild magic that will affect the target.
fnc:components/wild_damage.desc.precisio: Makes the damage trend more towards average numbers.
event.fnc.faction_ally_paladin: Your loyalty gives you the strength to ensure justice.  You have allied yourself with the Paladins!
event.fnc.faction_ally_wild: You feel the unpredictability of the magic around you, uniting with you.  You have allied yourself with the Wilde Courts!
fnc:armorupgrade/random_spell_adjustment: 25% * level chance for a positive random SpellAdjustment.
fnc:armorupgrade/wild_magic_luck.descrip: Increases your luck with Wild Magic.
